citation: Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 1998 (Tas)
text:
Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 1998

I make the following order with the agreement of the Minister for Forests under section 5(3) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

18 June 1998

JOHN BESWICK

Minister for Mines

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 1998 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Act applies to certain land
    The Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 is declared to apply to the forest reserves specified in Schedule 1 to this order.

SCHEDULE 1 - Forest reserves

Clause 3
